mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Card(cardCode, cardName, startDate, endDate, memo, cardCo, discount, saveFilename, originalFilename, logoSaveFilename, logoOriginalFilename) VALUES(card_seq.NEXTVAL,#{cardName},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{memo},#{cardCo},#{discount},#{saveFilename},#{originalFilename},#{logoSaveFilename},#{logoOriginalFilename})
